Content:: Nobody Wanted to Die (Lithuanian: Niekas nenorėjo mirti, Russian: Никто не хотел умирать) is a 1966 Lithuanian film made in Soviet Lithuania and directed by Vytautas Žalakevičius. Žalakevičius, actor Donatas Banionis, and cinematographer Jonas Gricius were awarded USSR State Prize for the film in 1967.[1]  This article related to a Soviet film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article related to a Lithuanian film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Nobody Wanted to Die - Wikipedia
